Author: VentingFooligan6000
Text: If you fast or restrict long enough you could potentially lose your menstrual cycle and you could be putting yourself at greater risk for osteoporosis. You may still experience hair loss, constipation, and unhealthy skin.  As someone who is towing the line between EDNOS and "healthy" restriction and I may be a normal weight but I haven't had a cycle in 296 days and it's gonna be an effort and process to get it back and as much as I don't like them they are major health indicators and if you wanna have a child it could make it difficult in the future
